title: Configure​
content: </> RoRooms:Configure(Config: Config) → () Reconciles RoRooms' config to your liking. Config type available here

title: Prompt​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> RoRooms:Prompt(Prompt: Prompt) → () Prompts the client, with support for callback buttons. Prompt type available here

title: Roblox - Easy loader ✅​
content: Get the RoRooms Loader modelInsert it from the ToolboxPlace into ReplicatedStorageStart configuring!

title: Roblox - Custom 🔧​
content: Download the RoRooms.rbxm file listed hereInsert RoRooms.rbxm into ReplicatedStorageRequire ReplicatedStorage.RoRoomsCall RoRooms:Start() from both the server and clientReference the API pages

title: Wally 🐶​
content: Copy the Wally detailsPaste it into your wally.toml dependenciesRun wally install

title: Easy Loader
content: Easy Loader Easily load and configure RoRooms without ever touching a line of code! Instead, use Roblox instances and attributes. Items 🔧 Items are Tool objects, and go under Config.Items. Attribute	Type	OptionalItemId	string	❌ Tool	Tool	❌ DisplayName	string	✅ LevelRequirement	number	✅ Category	string	✅ Color	Color3	✅ LabelText	string	✅ LabelIcon	string	✅ Emotes 💃 Emotes are Animation objects, and go under Config.Emotes. Attribute	Type	OptionalItemId	string	❌ Animation	Animation	❌ Emoji	string	✅ DisplayName	string	✅ LevelRequirement	number	✅ Category	string	✅ Color	Color3	✅ LabelText	string	✅ LabelIcon	string	✅ Music 🎶 Simply drop Sound instances into your Config.Music folder!
